biotools.summary: De novo OTU-picking pipeline integrating single- and paired-end 16S sequence tags. It is designed to take Illumina paired-end sequencing reads as input and output the OTU BIOM table, together with their representative sequences and a phylogenetic tree of OTUs.

bioschemas.name: Hybrid-denovo
bioschemas.summary: De novo OTU-picking pipeline integrating single- and paired-end 16S sequence tags. It is designed to take Illumina paired-end sequencing reads as input and output the OTU BIOM table, together with their representative sequences and a phylogenetic tree of OTUs.
